title: How many bedrooms does these homes have?
content: Casa Barahona: Four bedrooms and two bathrooms. | Casa Bahoruco: Two bedrooms and one bathroom. | Casa Bohecio: One bedroom and one bathroom.

title: How far is these holiday homes from the center of Altea?
content: It's 3km away from the center of Altea.

title: What are the check-in and check-out times?
content: Check-in is from 5:00 PM until 8:00 PM and check-out is from 8:00 AM until 11:00 AM.

title: What activities are prohibited in these homes?
content: Bachelors parties, stag parties, hen parties, and other similar events are not allowed.

title: Is there a refundable damage deposit?
content: A damage deposit of 300€ (200€ in case of Casa Bahoruco/Bohecio) is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full, in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.
